Battle Cards

Unconventional Flying Object

  1. Question about Unconventional Flying Object. Can this be played on a Spaceship that is already in bot mode in order to flip it to alt mode, essentially ignoring the first sentence as "already done" (somewhat similar to Hunker Down)?
    No, it cannot.
  2. If the Spaceship is already in bot mode, what happens?
    You would flip it to alt mode, even though it’s not flipping “back.”
